replies.msg:
基本上好接近。
a. You are definably right.
b. You are absolutely right.

a implies that you are right undoubtedly. Its focus is on the certainty of "being right"。
(肯定啱，一定唔會錯)

b implies that there does not exist a position which you could be "more" right. Not only are you right, you also can't be more "right".
(絕對嘅啱，冇得再啱啲)

不過語感上嚟講， absolutely 好常同 adjective一齊用, definitely 用法比較有彈性。
a. I am definitely going to take a break next week.
b. I am absolutely going to take a break next week.
呢兩句咁睇， b就冇咁順口.
I am absolutely excited about my vacation next week.
咁會比較自然

a implies that you are right undoubtedly. Its focus is on the certainty of "being right"。
(肯定啱，一定唔會錯)

b implies that there does not exist a position which you could be "more" right. Not only are you right, you also can't be more "right".
(絕對嘅啱，冇得再啱啲)

不過語感上嚟講， absolutely 好常同 adjective一齊用, definitely 用法比較有彈性。
a. I am definitely going to take a break next week.
b. I am absolutely going to take a break next week.
呢兩句咁睇， b就冇咁順口.
I am absolutely excited about my vacation next week.
咁會比較自然

利申：9up

簡單d講就係：
definitely 更多係表達一個事實，而absolutely 係emotion 強d咁表達意見/感受

大概會咁用：
He is definitely going to the club tonight.
He is absolultely ridiculous.

兩句放埋一齊可能更易明：
I definitely have an absolutely huge dick.

replies.msg:
Type 0: facts (兩邊都present tense)
-If you don’t drink water, you die.

Type 1: 有機會發生 real situation (if-clause: present, 後面future tense)
-If you don’t study hard, you will fail in the exam.

Type 2: 時間框架係現在, unreal,impossible situation (if-clause: simple past, 後面would + verb)
-If I were you, I would not make this decision.

Type 3: 時間框架係過去, unreal situation (if-clause: past perfect, 後面would + have + p.p.)
-If I had eaten that sandwich, I would not have been hungry for the entire evening.

quote.msg:
你可以睇下if-clause
呢個case應該要用type2 唔係type3
你揀果個option係type3
係俾past and unreal situation

而呢個case係type2
Type 2係for unreal, present situation
雖然佢if clause係用past tense但都係用係現在既situation

C2, DSE 5*

type 1 係基本 , 兩邊present tense講同事實有關
type 2/3 係前面 present perfect後面would have pp講發生左既事
type 2/3 係前面simple past 後面would do講冇可能既野?

Type 0: facts (兩邊都present tense)
-If you don’t drink water, you die.

Type 1: 有機會發生 real situation (if-clause: present, 後面future tense)
-If you don’t study hard, you will fail in the exam.

Type 2: 時間框架係現在, unreal,impossible situation (if-clause: simple past, 後面would + verb)
-If I were you, I would not make this decision.

Type 3: 時間框架係過去, unreal situation (if-clause: past perfect, 後面would + have + p.p.)
-If I had eaten that sandwich, I would not have been hungry for the entire evening.

有錯請指正

兩個月溝通唔到就正常啦。過來人話你知，你肯日日講既話你兩年後你已經可以講到非常流利。

好多人過去外國成幾年，英文都係垃圾，係因為佢地怕瘀怕被人笑，少講英文就少進步，最後就放棄，只係群班香港人
日日只講廣東話，英文想進步都難

所以你絕對唔可以放棄，尤其係頭一年，一定要逼自己同人用英文溝通，順便溝下鬼妹。絕對唔好怕瘀！去到某個歲數已經唔會有人笑你英文，大家都知你係努力緊

所以讀書最睇唔起果d圍爐嘅香港人
唔係睇唔起佢地埋堆而係佢地果種排他性
仲會打壓唔跟佢地嘅人, 例如我地呢d同local 有正常交流嘅人
boarding house會以人數優勢夾埋推舉個香港人做head boy

我個經歷都類似, 初到英國冇方向
埋local英文唔好被迫留喺香港堆但佢地個環境直接令我書都讀唔到
搞到幾乎俾人踢出校, 好在立馬搬走
同local guardian 住, 進步唔少, 又有自由
仲愛上一條友旅行, 先令我知英國有好多地方可以行
而家諗住移民返去, 已經知已經有咩地方適合

我走人嘅勇氣, 真係冇幾個人會做到
因為會斷六親咁濟
